titleStmt.title: Basilikon dōron. Or His Majesties instructions to his dearest sonne, Henry the prince
titleStmt.author: James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert VValde-graue printer to the Kings Majestie,

notesStmt.note: By James I, King of England.
First two words of title in Greek characters.
The roman numeral date is made with turned C's.
"From the method of leaf signatures this appears to have been only partly pr[inted]. by Waldegrave himself"--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
